title: Beautiful heritage hotel, extremely accommodating staff
text: The hotel is in a beautiful renovated 300 year old haveli with lovely jharokhas and doors, the interiors are tastefully done. The staff is very friendly, would like to give kudos to the manager who would go out of his way to accommodate requests - i sprained my leg and asked for ice, they didn't have it in the fridge, so he got it from outside. Would highly recommend staying here.

title: Evening
text: Visiting in the evening during Christmas season was a great experience, a must do activity in Florence.
place: Duomo - Cattedrale di Santa Maria del Fiore

title: Big hostel
text: Big hostel a lit bit of a walk from the city centre, but there are bus stops and tram stations close by. There are quite a few restaurants in the neighbourhood especially as you start walking towards he city centre.

title: Beautiful
text: Spent a great evening walking around the lake in the old town, lots of shipping and restaurants to choose from.

title: Clean and affordable
text: A bit far from the city centre in a residential neighbourhood but the team station is close by. Affordable and clean, with a big common area and bar downstairs. You can also buy souvenirs at their lobby.

title: Popular
text: Popular with tourists, a Mumbai landmark in Colaba, offering a wide variety in the menu, walking around the area is also an option.

title: CBD
text: Mumbai's swanky central business district with its 70s and 80s skyscrapers including the iconic Air India building.

title: Queen's necklace
text: Also called queen's necklace, beautiful art deco buildings line the road, ending with Nariman point.

title: Important infrastructure project
text: One of India's biggest infrastructure projects providing easy connectivity between Worli and Bandra.

title: Always nice
text: When I visited, it was quiet because of the reduced activity because of the pandemic, a historic Mumbai landmark.

title: Iconic
text: Iconic restaurant representative of the. Irani cafes that opened in Mumbai, in Ballard estate Fort area

title: Breakfast
text: Good place for coffee and breakfast near the Central market in Monastraki, good vibe, bunch of shops close by.

title: Good food
text: Restaurant located on the first floor, located on the main road in Tapovan. Has Indian, Israeli and Continental dishes. Many kinds of fresh juices.

title: Parsi cuisine
text: Parsi cuisine very close to Terminal 2 of Mumbai international airport, the restaurant is located at The Orb which is adjacent to JW Marriott. I tried the Berry Pulov, they have many options for vegetarians and a dedicated page for egg based recipes.

title: Whitefield mall
text: One of the biggest malls in Bangalore, close to Whitefield and KR Puram areas, many restaurants and bars close by.

title: Metro
text: Accessible from the Cubbon park metro station, can also walk from the Mahatma Gandhi road metro station.

title: MG road
text: Opposite the Taj hotel on MG road, very close to Trinity circle metro station and the church, many restaurants.

title: Koramangala hangout
text: The biggest mall in this part of Bangalore, one of the oldest malls in the city, many restaurants, bars and shops to choose from.

title: Smell of Sandalwood
text: At the junction of Brigade road and MG road, in an old building, run by the state government which means fixed prices.

title: Quintessential Bangalore
text: A favourite of the locals as well as tourists, great to walk around, shop, check out restaurants and bars.

title: Convenient
text: Convenient for north-south and east-west travel in Bangalore, connecting KR Puram to Mysore road and Tumkur road to Kanakapura road.

title: Always fun
text: Always fun to visit, many restaurants to choose from, the terrace is beautiful with outdoor seating and an amphitheatre.

title: Church street
text: Cafe downstairs, bar and lounge upstairs and a club in the front, good location on Church Street, right across the metro station.

title: Indian
text: Apparently the only Indian restaurant in Santorini, a bit far from the Fira city centre but walkable, friendly staff.

title: Clean beautiful hotel
text: One of the few hotels that was open during the winter in January. Clean, comfortable room with a balcony and good views of the horizon. It is a bit far from Fira centre but walkable and there is a bus stand close by.

title: Great location
text: The hostel has a great location within walking distance of the Monastraki square, there by close to many historic landmarks as well as shopping and restaurants. It is located in a not so touristy street. Clean rooms and lively common area.

title: Magnificent
text: Near Monastraki, close to the stadium and Syntagma square, the scale of this structure is magnificent despite the missing pillars.

title: Nice views
text: If you are looking for a trek and views a bit off the tourist trail, this is the place with great views of the city.

title: Nice cafe and restaurant
text: Nice cafe and restaurant in the Monastraki area, next to a square with a bunch of restaurants, has outdoor seating.

title: Good vibe
text: A very popular cafe and bar among locals, was very lively when I went in the evening, with a nice decor.

title: Beer!
text: More than 40 beers on tap and more bottled from all over the world, food has typical bar menu with couple of vegetarian options.

title: Beautiful neighbourhood
text: Beautiful historical neighbourhood with narrow lanes and many restaurants and cafes, at the foothills of the Acropolis.

title: Small but impressive
text: Relatively small compared to other museums in Athens, in a historic building, walking distance from Athens city centre.

title: Fun
text: Great place to walk around with many shops, restaurants and views of the Acropolis, good place to look for souvenirs.

title: Just below the Acropolis
text: Just below the Acropolis hill, also has ancient roads, buildings and ruins along with a well preserved temple.

title: Well preserved
text: One of the most well preserved structures in Athens, impressive details and part of the Agora museum and park.

title: Saw it from outside
text: This is restored ancient stadium, the only stadium in the world made out of marble, they charge a 5 Euro entrance fee.

title: Highlight
text: Highlight of the visit to Athens and Acropolis, I went on a free day which meant it was slightly crowded.

title: Must do
text: A big far from the Acropolis museum but you can still walk or take the metro. The most important museum if you want to learn about Greek history.

title: Majestic
text: The top attraction of Athens, visible from all parts of the city centre, truly impressive in scale and beauty.

title: Must visit
text: I would suggest visiting the Museum first and then the Acropolis to understand more about the Acropolis.

title: Old and popular
text: Nice decor and menu with old motifs, friendly staff, have many vegetarian options including kebab. Desserts are plenty.

title: Not a backpacker hostel
text: The hostel had families living with their groceries occupying most of the room. The form room was relatively small. The location is close to Victoria station and is close to central Athens by walk or metro.

title: Budget friendly and good
text: Budget friendly private room, small but good considering other hotels and hostels in the area, close to Monastraki - 5 mins by taxi, couple of cafes and restaurants close by. The hotel has a bar downstairs and they serve a nice breakfast.

title: Dessert
text: Popular place in near Monastraki right next to Streetwok, has Greek speciality desserts and coffee and drinks.

title: Great noodles
text: Open till late in the night, very popular, street food style fried noodles and rice with various customizations.

title: View
text: Restaurant near the flea market with a view of the Acropolis, has outdoor and indoor seating, I ordered the veg Massouka.

title: Take away Pizza
text: Great place for a breakfast Pizza, open in the morning, have freshly made Pizza and other dishes like Arranchini and Lasagna.

title: Near the Termini
text: One of the nicer restaurants near the Termini, friendly staff, have good selection of wines and beers.

title: Near the Vatican
text: Right next to the bridge after which it's names, close to the Vatican - family run, popular with tourists.

title: Near the Colosseum
text: Down the road from the Colosseum,they charge a 10% service charge, friendly staff and good food. It's a huge restaurant.

title: Outdoor and indoor
text: Populr restaurant on a street that has many shops catering to tourists, I tried the Marinara pizza, it was good.

title: Near the Lambrate station
text: The hostel is close to the Lambrate train station which also has a metro and a tram station. The hostel has clean rooms and the private rooms are not so expensive, they have a kitchen on the ground floor for guests.

title: Good location
text: The hostel has a good location, it's walking distance from the Termini station fro where you can catch the metro and trains. On the 2nd floor onwards in the building, clean and spacious rooms. They have a bar near the lobby.

title: Beautiful
text: Beautiful square near many sights in Rome, with beautiful fountains and a carousel during Christmas holidays.

title: Next to Colosseum
text: We did a combined tour of the Roman Forum, Palatine hill and Colosseum, an archaeologist cum guide takes you around.

title: Combined tour
text: We did a combined tour of the Roman Forum, Palatine hill and Colosseum, an archaeologist cum guide takes you around.

title: Popular but simple
text: Despite being just a flight of steps leading to a church, very popular among tourists, nice place to sit and enjoy the views.

title: Better in real life!
text: No matter how many photos of Michaelangelo's work you have seen, this is always a breathtaking experience.

title: Combined tour
text: We did the Vatican Museums and St Peter's Basilica combined your, the Vatican museum and Sistine Chapel were very crowded, but definitely a must visit.

title: Do the tour
text: A good way to skip the lines and gain an easy entry is by signing up for combined Vatican museum and Basilica tour.

title: Beautiful
text: Beautiful on the inside and outside, surprising to understand it's history and it's standing after thousands of years.

title: Popular
text: One of the most popular tourist attractions in Rome, the fountain where people throw coins to pray for their wishes to come true.

title: Must do
text: Always buy a ticket for the tour I visit Rome, always a great experience albeit a bit crowded, gives you a good perspective of Rome's history.

title: Good Irish pub
text: Near the Fatherland monument, walking distance from the Colosseum, popular with tourists and expats, huge place.

title: Near the Champs Elysees
text: Restaurant not on the main Champs Elysees road but on a cross road, less crowded and popular with locals.

title: Brassiere 12-15
text: Also called Douze-Quinze 12-15, popular with locals in the area, close to LA fayette and Opera, pub with good selection of beers.

title: Close to Gare Du Nord
text: Popular with the locals - bar and restaurant walking distance from Gare Du Nord, beer, wine and usual French fare.

title: Neelkanth
text: On the way to Neelkanth, less crowded than the other waterfalls, also a good idea to hike, information available from travel agents.

title: Peaceful
text: Not as crowded as some of the other ghats, you can take a shared auto from upper Rishikesh or Ram Jhula.

title: Ancient
text: One of the historic buildings in Rishikesh, close to Lakshman Jhula, many shops and restaurants close by.

title: Also called 108 Ashram
text: This is now run by the forest department, also called 108 ashram or the Beatles ashram, beautiful art and graffiti.

title: Calm
text: One of the few ashrams in Rishikesh, green and peaceful, some people meditate, good place to get away from the crowds.

title: Hike
text: One of few waterfalls in the vicinity of Rishikesh, many agencies offer tours, you can also hike on your own.

title: Must visit
text: Definitely make it a point to visit this part open art gallery, part abandoned buildings, part museum of Beatles stay.

title: Popular
text: One of the popular places for Ganga Aarti although not as popular as Ram Jhula ashram, close to Rishikesh city centre.

title: Beautiful
text: Beautiful cathedral often missed as it is outside the old town, impressive architecture with many restaurants close by

title: Easy connectivity
text: Offers easy connectivity between East ad West Bangalore, and North and South Bangalore. A bit overcrowded during morning and evening peak hours.

title: Good location
text: The hotel has a very good location,walking distance from the Yeshwanthpur and Goraguntepalya metro stations, few restaurants are close by and Orion mall is not that far. They have an in-house restaurant and bar.

title: Location
text: The hotel is fairly new with everything looking newly done. They have a in-house menu offerings room service. The hotel is on the road to Royal Orchid hotel, close to Indiranagar, Koramangala and Embassy Golf links.
place: Treebo Trend Emora Hotel and Suites
